comment: Jerry Wolkowitz, a freelance photographer, reporter, writer and first aid volunteer was brutally beaten, assaulted & run over with his own car because he was white. Remained in coma for months & passed away today. RIP
amr:
# ::snt Jerry Wolkowitz, a freelance photographer, reporter, writer and first aid volunteer was brutally beaten, assaulted & run over with his own car because he was white. Remained in coma for months & passed away today. RIP
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / and
            :op1 (b / beat-01
                  :ARG1 (p / person
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Jerry"
                              :op2 "Wolkowitz")
                        :ARG0-of (p2 / photograph-01)
                        :mod (f / freelancer)
                        :ARG0-of (r / report-01)
                        :ARG0-of (w / write-01)
                        :ARG0-of (v / volunteer-01
                              :ARG1 (a2 / aid-01
                                    :mod (f2 / first))))
                  :ARG1-of (b2 / brutal-02))
            :op2 (a3 / assault-01
                  :ARG1 p
                  :instrument (c / car
                        :poss p))
            :op3 (r2 / run-over-12
                  :ARG1 p
                  :instrument c)
            :ARG1-of (c2 / cause-01
                  :ARG0 (w2 / white-02
                        :ARG1 p)))
      :snt2 (a4 / and
            :op1 (r3 / remain-01
                  :ARG1 (c3 / coma)
                  :duration (m2 / multiple
                        :op1 (t / temporal-quantity
                              :quant 1
                              :unit (m3 / month))))
            :op2 (p3 / pass-away-16
                  :ARG1 (p4 / person
                        :name n
                        :op1 "Jerry"
                        :op2 "Wolkowitz"))
            :time (t2 / today))
      :snt3 (w3 / wish-01
            :ARG1 (r4 / rest-01
                  :ARG1 p4)))
